General.Name: Time Publishing and Media Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Time Publishing and Media Co., Ltd. publishes various books and periodicals in China. It is also involved in the print reproduction, media technology research and development, online education, digital printing and publishing, e-commerce, and equity investment and other activities. The company engages in printing of teaching materials and aids, general books, newspapers, bills, and other packaging. The company is based in Hefei, China. Time Publishing and Media Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Anhui Publishing Group Co., Ltd.

7.Name: Ms. Yuying  Liu
7.Title: Sec. of the Commission for Discipline Inspection
